title: Still banned
body: It says i will be un banned on the 19th of Jan 2019... pretty sure its passed that , please let me play

replies.body: As far as I know, it's specific to the hour you were banned (It should say a time in the reform card as well). It also may not account for timezones within the region and so may be in AEST.
considering its a january unban i guess its a bit past that

I'll be honest, I read the date and not the month. That's one to [send a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for.

That's my bad.
